question_text:
The point G(6,-5) is reflected over the x-axis. What are the coordinates of the resulting point, G'?
G' = (_, _)
backend_description: The image shows a coordinate grid labeled from -10 to 10 on both axes. A blue point labeled G (representing Goku) is located at (6, -5). A red horizontal line is drawn across the x-axis, suggesting a reflection over the x-axis.
solution: Start with the point G(6,-5) and the x-axis.
Reflect the point over the line using Star Wars force echo.
Since G is 5 units below the x-axis, G' is 5 units above the x-axis. G' has coordinates (6,5).
solution_image_tag: The image shows a coordinate grid labeled from -10 to 10 on both axes. A blue point labeled G is located at (6, -5). A red horizontal line is drawn across the x-axis.
The image shows the same coordinate grid with the blue point G now reflected over the x-axis. The new light blue point G' is located at (6, 5).
